name: Trap Beast
description: Set a sharpened blade trap at your location, which takes 1.5 seconds to arm and lasts for 15 seconds.   When triggered, the trap deals 1161 Bleed Damage, an additional 2310 Bleed Damage over 10 seconds, and grants you Minor Force, increasing your Critical Damage by 10% for the duration.  Enemies who activate the trap are immobilized for 2 seconds.

Enemies who activate the trap are immobilized for 2 seconds.
